message: Starting analysis of current explanations in week10.json and week11.json to identify ADHD-unfriendly patterns
Read both week10 and week11 JSON files. Now analyzing explanations for ADHD-unfriendly patterns. Identifying vague language, missing mechanisms, abstractions, and lack of structure.

COMPLETED: Analyzed all explanations in week10.json and week11.json. Identified 5 major ADHD-unfriendly patterns with 15+ quoted examples: (1) Vague language, (2) Missing mechanisms, (3) Metaphors/abstractions, (4) Lack of structure, (5) Overgeneralizations. Created comprehensive analysis document (explanation_problems_analysis.md) with specific examples, contrast with good explanations, and detailed rewriting guidelines aligned with user feedback: 'no metaphors, no abstract meaning.' Document includes concrete DO/DON'T lists and rewriting template.
